description: Schema for the codified Autonomous Mutation Intent (M-01), triggering the GSEP pipeline. This standard guarantees auditable input for Stage 1 Policy Vetting.

fields.name: Intent_ID
fields.description: Unique, immutable identifier for this specific evolution request (SHA-256 derived from payload and metadata).

fields.name: Proposing_Agent_ID
fields.description: The Sovereign AGI subsystem responsible for initiating the intent (e.g., PerformanceMonitor/V4).

fields.name: Target_Component_Manifest
fields.description: Specific list of files or modules targeted by the M-02 mutation payload.

fields.name: Optimization_Goal_Vector
fields.description: The measurable systemic goal this mutation attempts to optimize (e.g., LatencyReduction/12ms, SecurityPatch/CVE-404).

fields.name: Context_Trace_Link
fields.description: Immutable reference link to the originating PDFS or DIM data trace that mandated this evolution request.

fields.name: Risk_Priority_Claim
fields.description: Agent's subjective assessment of urgency and criticality, used as a weighted input for S-02 calculation.

fields.name: M-02_Hash_Reference
fields.description: The cryptographic SHA-256 hash linking this M-01 intent record to the actual M-02 Mutation Payload (required prior to Stage 2 Payload Security).
